name: ElevenLabs TTS
author: Lumia Stream
description: Generate ElevenLabs speech or music audio and play it through Lumia Stream.

settings.label: Key ID (API Key)
settings.helperText: Create an API key in your ElevenLabs dashboard.

actions.label: Speak
actions.description: Generate ElevenLabs TTS audio and play it in Lumia.

fields.label: Message
fields.helperText: Text to synthesize. Character limits vary per model; long messages will be truncated.

fields.label: Max Characters (optional)
fields.helperText: Leave empty to use the model limit; if set, the smaller limit is used.

fields.label: Voice ID
fields.helperText: Find this in ElevenLabs Voice Lab or your Voices page.

fields.label: Model ID
fields.helperText: Choose a speech model or type a custom model ID.

fields.label: Stability (0-1)
fields.helperText: Higher is more consistent; lower is more expressive.

fields.label: Similarity Boost (0-1)
fields.helperText: Higher keeps closer to the original voice.

actions.label: Stream Music
actions.description: Generate ElevenLabs music and play it in Lumia.

fields.label: Prompt
fields.defaultValue: Warm lo-fi beats with soft piano and vinyl crackle.
fields.helperText: Describe the music you want. Prompts can be long; use Max Characters to cap the length.

fields.label: Composition Plan JSON (optional)
fields.helperText: Advanced structure. Leave empty to use prompt only.

fields.label: Music Length (ms)
fields.helperText: Length of the generated clip in milliseconds.

fields.label: Model ID
fields.helperText: Choose a music model or type a custom model ID.

fields.label: Save Music File to Desktop
fields.helperText: Saves the generated audio to your Desktop.
